>>>>>>> feature/task

From Wikipedia:

> The Unicode Standard permits the BOM in UTF-8, but does not require nor recommend its use. Byte order has no meaning in UTF-8.

## Install

```
<<<<<<< HEAD

=======
$ npm install strip-bom
>>>>>>> feature/task
```

## Usage

```js
const stripBom = require('strip-bom');

stripBom('\uFEFFunicorn');
//=> 'unicorn'
```
